`model_info = model.fit_generator(datagen.flow(x_train, y_train, batch_size=batch_size),
steps_per_epoch=steps_per_epoch,
validation_data=(x_test, y_test),
epochs=epochs, verbose=1, workers=4,
callbacks=callbacks)
def print_regularization():
for layer in model.layers:
weights = layer.get_weights()
weights = np.array(weights)
print (weights.shape)
print ((weights))
`
Weights by itself seems to be correct, but the shape seems to be wrong/incomplete. am I doing something wrong here
